content.question:
Dr. Bach is trying to determine whether people will conform to a group’s decisions about choosing a new laptop computer. She places each research participant into a pre-determined group that contains confederates. Each of the confederates were told to choose the same laptop from a list of options and share their decision with the rest of the group. Dr. Bach then documents the selection made by the participants.
What element of Dr. Bach’s research will necessitate the use of debriefing?

skill.text: 2.D: Evaluate whether a psychological research scenario followed appropriate ethical procedures.
